mapper.select: SELECT CLI_NAME, PRJ_NAME, PRJ_PROGRESS FROM PROJECTS p
SELECT CLI_NAME, PRJ_NAME, PRJ_PROGRESS, PRJ_STATUS, PRJ_SDATE, PRJ_DDATE FROM PROJECTS p WHERE PRJ_STATUS = '진행중'
SELECT CLI_NAME, PRJ_NAME, PRJ_PROGRESS, PRJ_STATUS, PRJ_SDATE, PRJ_DDATE FROM PROJECTS p WHERE PRJ_STATUS = '완료'
SELECT u.USER_NAME FROM USERINFO u JOIN PROJECT_MEM m ON u.USER_ID = m.USER_ID
SELECT PRJ_ID, CLI_NAME, PRJ_NAME, PRJ_SDATE, PRJ_DDATE, PRJ_STATUS, PRJ_MANAGER, PRJ_PROGRESS FROM PROJECTS WHERE CLI_NAME = #{cli_name}
SELECT PRJ_ID, CLI_NAME, PRJ_NAME, PRJ_SDATE, PRJ_DDATE, PRJ_STATUS, PRJ_MANAGER, PRJ_PROGRESS FROM PROJECTS WHERE PRJ_SDATE = #{prj_sdate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDS (PRJ_ID, USER_ID, RANKS_NAME, USER_NAME) VALUES( #{prj_id},#{user_id}, (SELECT RANKS_NAME FROM RANKS r JOIN USERINFO u ON r.RANKS_SEQ =u.RANKS_SEQ WHERE u.USER_ID = #{user_id} ), (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}) )
